A good video guide on how to build a small mk 2 Sato using parts that can be accessed either late game or in sandbox it can hold little or no cargo, and only a few passengers but functions rather well.

Edited November 4, 2019 by Fenceingmadman

It's easy to build SSTOs in recent versions of KSP.  In fact, it's hardly worth staging at all for many loads.  Here are a couple of the most basic SSTO designs I know

This is about the lightest and cheapest 'basic' SSTO you can build:

  • Aerodynamic Nosecone
  • RC-001S Remote Guidance Unit
  • FL-T200 Fuel Tank
  • FL-T100 Fuel Tank
  • 2 x 24-77 "Twitch" Liquid Fuel Engines

6 parts, 3,375 funds, 1.978t.

The MOST basic SSTO would just use 2 parts but always find it flips out unless I add the nosecone.  It's ridiculously expensive and overpowered so tweak the engines to 30%

  • Protective Rocket Nosecone Mk7
  • RC-L01 Remote Guidance Unit
  • LFB KR-1x2 "Twin Boar" Liquid  Fuel Engine

3 parts, 20,850 funds, 43.2t.  Obviously it's the integrated fuel + engine of the twin boar that makes this so simple.
